name: Connecting People
description:
Description

In this immersive narrative adventure, the player must help a stranger by talking to them via text messages.

The Story Begins...

You find an old Nokia 3310 phone. When you switch it on, you realize that there is 1 unread message on it. When was it sent? Who sent it? Will you reply?

Controls

ButtonsActionEnter/SpaceContinueLeft & right arrow keysChoose dialogue option

Game Jam

This game was developed for the Nokia 3310 Jam 2 in February 2020.

Please note: We deliberately chose NOT to cover the jam's theme "Death is good" because it didn't fit the story we wanted to tell.
